ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisREMISSION ORDER CONCERNING CERTAIN EXPENSES INCURRED AS A RESULT OF THE TSUNAMI DISASTER OF DECEMBER 26, 2004 IN SOUTH AND SOUTHEAST ASIA - which provides for the remission of consular and passport fees payable by Canadian citizens who were victims of the tsunami, as well as other amounts owed to the Government of Canada in connection with that disaster.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2006-0100 Publication Date: 2006-07-12
